metadata.title: CVE-2020-14876 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Trade Management product of Oracle E-BusinessSuite (component: User Interface). Supported versions that are affected are12.1.1 - 12.1.3 and 12.2.3 - 12.2.10. Easily exploitable vulnerabilityallows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromiseOracle Trade Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access tocritical data or all Oracle Trade Management accessible data as well asunauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle TradeManagement accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 9.1 (Confidentiality andIntegrity impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).
